Reviews.Title: Missed a memory card but for the price and the fast shipping I am happy and still give a 5*
Reviews.Author: Roger Hwang
Reviews.Content: The shipment was fast and the camera is as described.  The Sony A7 is pretty amazing to go with all my canon lenses(with adapter) and some legacy lens.  Only took me a couple hours to tumbling through the menu and have it setup and now I just take pictures :)  coming from long time using canon, I still wish the shutter button is a bit more forward or directly above the front dial but that probably don't bother others.So far I am very happy with this purchase but as the title suggested that in my package I got everything except that I only received 1 memory card instead of 2.  I didn't bother to complain about this because I pay the price that would have been the cost of the camera if I have bought this with Amazon (as vendor) body only.
